titleStmt.title: At a council held at Boston in New-England, January 6, 1679 by the council, Edward Rawson, secretary.
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Council.
Rawson, Edward, 1615-1693.

notesStmt.note: First line of text reads: The Lord having been exceeding gracious and long suffering to his people in this wilderness ...
Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
